item.title: PI string owner
item.dc:creator: @wannaflyhi wannaflyhi
item.description:
@wannaflyhi wrote:

so basically im looking for the following, im currently using a PI base and i know some commands.java may vary on how they are originized the commands.java im dealing with is the orginized version where there is a legend that says example :
@Override
public void processPacket(Client c, int packetType, int packetSize) {
String playerCommand = c.getInStream().readString();
Misc.println(c.playerName + " playerCommand: " + playerCommand);
if (c.playerRights >= 1) {// 1
moderatorCommands(c, playerCommand);
}
if (c.playerRights >= 2) { // 2
adminCommands(c, playerCommand);
}
if (c.playerRights >= 3) { // 3
ownerCommands(c, playerCommand);
}
if (c.isDonator >= 1) { // 1
donorCommands(c, playerCommand);
}
playerCommands(c, playerCommand);
}

So how would i make something kinda like this but a status that goes by name, example if your name is Mod Allstar you will have commands that only Mod Allstar can use how would i go about doing that?

Read full topic
